name: Hodlinator
cooked: If the originating node of the next PoW block shares its template ahead of time with its direct peers, they would be able to reconcile compact blocks at a much higher rate, but would there be much benefit for indirect peers? My understanding is that indirect peers would not be forwarding templates they received from others, or is that a thing in this design?
